subtitle: Hello everyone, quick video here - some of you asked that I make a video once
my book is published explaining what it's about and I finally finished it and the paperback and
ebook versions are all live on Amazon so here you go, so let me first explain why I made this book
and the events that led up to it - as a lot of you know i've been practicing meditation
and astral projection for over 10 years now and something i've not mentioned yet is that actually
during most of that time i never told anyone about my experiences or knowledge i literally
didn't tell anyone even close friends and family and i didn't even tell
friends who were interested in spiritual topics too i just didn't reveal anything, i felt like
my experiences were mine, you know, my own intimate experiences just for me, that's
how much i valued and cherished this ability that i discovered, you know, i didn't want to
dishonor it or do it injustice by describing it to others with my limited human language
i guess i sort of developed some belief as well that if i tell people i won't have as
many experiences, you know i worked so hard to get those experiences, but yeah that's
you know that's really ultimately just a self-limiting belief, one of many we can form...
so yeah it was actually only up until around six months ago
amidst the pandemic that i became more public, publishing small articles and experiences in
order to help others during a time where everyone is forced into solitude and introspection so
yeah um out of those 10 years i've only been public about it in the last six months
so yeah and since becoming public, to my surprise and gratefulness to help people
i received hundreds of questions from people struggling with the same practices of meditation
lucid dreaming astral projection, you know, the works, and i was surprised to
see how many people were really lost, so yeah this book is dedicated to those people
to you guys, who are on the path and seeking help, and i sincerely hope the book does just that
okay so the book is called: "Beyond Dreaming: A Guide on How to Astral Project & How The
Awakening of Consciousness Is Synonymous With Lucid Dreaming and Astral Projection"... i'll put
some screenshots of the table of contents on the screen now, which is from the paperback version
so this book aims to address all those common questions i got from people and still do of course
and to transmit my knowledge for the purpose of practical understanding of astral projection
okay? the focus on the book is practical um meaning it's a book to be read mindfully
and contemplatively with your own intuition, this is not a book that scientifically or
intellectually debates or speculates about astral projection, i do give a few
scientific references in the book but generally speaking the book is about helping others to
practice and realise some of the information given in the book, so that hopefully, through mindfulness
and consideration it will aid and compliment your own practices and experiences
to quote myself as i mention in the book: "through practical understanding alone
we get rid of the need for ineffective methods and complex practices which harbor self-doubt
often seen in books which promise quick results through techniques backed by little explanation
when we instinctively comprehend the mechanics behind out-of-body experiences
we adopt our own intuitive practice"... with that said i do provide several methods and exercises
in the book, each one doing the best i can to explain how it works, as you know from my videos i
like to explain in-depth about all this phenomena of non-physical states of consciousness right?
you know, rather than just telling you the surface layer of things like "hey to astral project from
a lucid dream just fly" no i i always do my best to explain it even though it is challenging
you know, it's one thing to be a skilled astral projector and a completely other skill to be able
to teach it effectively through intellectual words, as i said before you know, spoken human
language is all but a vain attempt to describe the indescribable... another big focus you'll see in the
book is that it emphasizes how dreaming while asleep is no different from when we daydream
while awake, similar to my previous videos it explores how the average person lives in a
perpetual dream-like state throughout their entire lives and this tendency to be dreamy
often has a strong hold over our awareness, both while we're awake and also while we're asleep
so you'll see this topic emphasized in different ways throughout the book because frankly it is
key in understanding how to go beyond the layers of subconscious perception in order to reach
more objective states of consciousness, so the book is simply about walking the path of astral
projection in a wholesome and natural way which is synonymous with the awakening of consciousness
okay so i'll keep it short uh if you want to read a bit more about the description of the book
simply check it out on Amazon all the links to buy the book are in the description below
just choose your country's Amazon and if i've missed out on your country just simply go to
your country's Amazon and type "Beyond Dreaming by Gene Hart"... oh and also i have a favor to ask uh
if any of you decide to buy the paperback version i would really be grateful if you could take some
nice pictures of it for me uh the pictures on the screen were taken by someone else who bought it uh
amazon basically ships it out next day delivery i believe that's how they got it so fast, um but yeah
i'm asking for pictures because i can't get my hands on a physical copy, which i'm annoyed about
because i live in korea uh i'll most likely be here for several years as well so you know i was
doing all that hard work to finish the book and couldn't wait to get my hands on the physical copy
for that feeling of satisfaction and you know just for a souvenir but i can't, so if any of you could
send me pictures that would be awesome, oh and if anyone could leave a review on amazon after your
purchase that would be great um i deliberately uh priced it at the lowest that i could to at least
give myself a bit of support, um a big portion of the money goes towards amazon and uh authors only
take a relatively smaller percentage um you know i would never extortionately price resources that
give out this kind of knowledge, i'm completely against that because this knowledge should be
freely accessible to all people during this time and era in the modern world... okay so if you have
any questions about the book just let me know in the comments below and i really hope it helps
whoever decides to buy the book thank you and subscribe if you haven't already as i will be
releasing more videos about different methods that you can use to reach the astral plane thank you
